column4: can anyone please help me get dual displays working in ubuntu?.. i've gotten as far as having the desktop cloned on each monitor.. but when i turn the Xinerama option on, the second monitor shuts off
Ugh. :P well my example nvidia x config wont help ya much then.
could try out that mepis live cd.. it had some helper tool for 2 montior setup. then snag/dissect its xorg.conf :P if it works
